channel.title: Trophy Gold: Hester's Mill
channel.description:
**Trophy Gold: Hester's Mill** Struggling to meet your financial obligations, you have become a treasure-hunter. It's a dangerous job but... you have pretty much run out of other options. You have heard tell of the ruins of a once-prosperous village in a now-abandoned land: What riches might still lie there? And what dangers?
*Trophy Gold* is a dark fantasy RPG about desperate treasure-hunters seeking riches in forgotten places. It's Old School role-playing using a modern lightweight ruleset influenced by story-games.
This game will use safety tools: X-Card, Lines & Veils, and Open Door, and complies with the [Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html).
3 sessions, Thursday nights in November, 8:00 PM EST 11/5: [Trophy Gold: Hester's Mill - Session 1](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MK2vZe8uxSzfbcUipbS) 11/12: [Trophy Gold: Hester's Mill - Session 2](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MK2viavPPgTF9h8YvVr) 11/19: [Trophy Gold: Hester's Mill - Session 3](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MK2wJc3xx_vy6u2rDT3)
